mapper.select: select a.*,c.id as pole_id,c.name as pole_name from ems_check a inner join ems_task b on a.task_id=b.id inner join ems_pole c on b.pole_id=c.id

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name ,f.orginal_id,f.orginal_type,f.orginal_name from ems_checklist h inner join ems_equipment a on h.ecode=a.ecode inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ( select a.ecode,b.id as orginal_id,'pole' as orginal_type,b.name as orginal_name from ems_equipment_pole a,ems_pole b where a.pole_id=b.id --and ecode='01011Z-**-1607290051' union all select a.ecode,b.id as orginal_id,'repair' as orginal_type,b.name as orginal_name from ems_equipment_repair a,ems_store b where a.repair_id=b.id --and ecode='01011Z-**-1607290051' union all select a.ecode,b.id as orginal_id,'store' as orginal_type,b.name as orginal_name from ems_equipment_store a,ems_store b where a.store_id=b.id --and ecode='01011Z-**-1607290051' union all select a.ecode,b.id as orginal_id,'workunit' as orginal_type,b.name as orginal_name from ems_equipment_workunit a,ems_workunit b where a.workunit_id=b.id --and ecode='01011Z-**-1607290051' ) f on a.ecode=f.ecode where h.check_id=#{check_id} order by a.ecode

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name ,f.orginal_id,f.orginal_type,f.orginal_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ( select a.ecode,b.id as orginal_id,'pole' as orginal_type,b.name as orginal_name,a.pole_id from ems_equipment_pole a,ems_pole b where a.pole_id=b.id ) f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.pole_id=#{pole_id} order by a.ecode
